globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: blob: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https: data:; connect-src 'self' https: wss:; object-src 'none'
